solution_line_template: The points Roosevelt high school has for the second game are {first_game_points}/{half_divisor}=<<{first_game_points}/{half_divisor}={second_game_points}>>{second_game_points} points.
The points Roosevelt high school has for the third game are {second_game_points}*{triple_multiplier}=<<{second_game_points}*{triple_multiplier}={third_game_points}>>{third_game_points} points.

The total points Roosevelt high school has for the tournament are {first_game_points}+{second_game_points}+{third_game_points}+{bonus_points}=<<{first_game_points}+{second_game_points}+{third_game_points}+{bonus_points}={roosevelt_total_points}>>{roosevelt_total_points} points.

The total points Greendale high school has for the tournament are {roosevelt_total_points}-{greendale_less_points}=<<{roosevelt_total_points}-{greendale_less_points}={greendale_total_points}>>{greendale_total_points} points.
